education.title: Le Quy Don High School for the Gifted - Vietnam
education.text: During 3 years at the high school, I studied in the specialized mathematics class. I participated in numerous competitions in this subject, and most notably in my 12th grade, I achieved the encouragement prize in the national mathematics Olympiad.

education.title: FIMI - INSA Lyon
education.text: In 2021, I was admitted to INSA Lyon in France and participated in the FIMI program (preparatory training for engineers). In the 2-year program, I achieved a quite high average score, with around 16/20 in the first year and 14.5/20 in the second year. Especially in the second year, I was among the top 10% of the school.

education.title: Computer Science - INSA Lyon
education.text: My good academic performance in the second year allowed me to join the Computer Science department at INSA. Throughout this year, I have been provided with a lot of knowledge in data, application programming, etc.

education.title: Self-study
education.text: In addition to the knowledge provided by educational institutions, I am proactive in seeking additional materials from outside sources such as those on W3Schools, YouTube, etc., and even on Coursera. For example, I have participated in courses like 'Backend with NodeJS' by IBM, or courses in 'Android Developer' by Meta, etc.
